title: Income Tax (Turnover Tax) (Amendment) Regulations, 2021
content:
31st December, 2021 Statutory Instruments 787
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 108 OF 2021
The Income Tax Act
(Laws, Volume 19 Cap. 323)
The Income Tax (Turnover Tax) (Amendment)
Regulations, 2021
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 64A of the Income
Tax Act, the following Regulations are made:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Income Tax Title and
Tax (Turnover Tax) (Amendment) Regulations, 2021, and shall be Commencement
read as one with the Income Tax (Turnover Tax) Regulations. S.I. No. 47 of
2009
(2) These regulations shall come into operation on 1st January,
2022.
2. Regulation 2 of the principal Regulations is amended by Amendment
the deletion of the difinition of “turnover” and the substitution therefor of regulation
of the following” 2
“turnover” includes gross earnings, income, revenue, takings,
yield or proceeds, but does not include interest, royalties or dividends.
DR S. MUSOKOTWANE,
LUSAKA Minister of Finance
[30th December, 2021] and National Planning
[MFB.64/9/4C]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O.Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka Price K4.00 each
